titles.title: A bill to include phosphate and potash on the final list of critical minerals of the Department of the Interior.
A bill to include phosphate and potash on the final list of critical minerals of the Department of the Interior.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill includes phosphate and potash on a list of mineral commodities that are critical to the U.S. economy and national security.
